attributes.action: Prevent arms companies operating within the UK if they sell arms to dictators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must create humanitarian legislation to ban international and national arms manufacture companies from trading and/or operating within the UK region if they, or any division of their organisation, supplies arms to dictators or to situations where civilians would be deliberately targeted. Additionally we must make arms companies within the UK take responsibility for where their arms are used, or face financial penalties.
